name: Blizzard
effect: Wind Based. Roll 3 Chance Dice to Frostbite those affected. If performed under Hail Weather or Snow Weather, Ignore this move's Reduced Accuracy and gain Never Fail. If performed under Sunny Weather Accuracy becomes -3 instead. -2 Accuracy.
description: The user swirls a violent gelid wind around the foes. This blizzard may not last long, but it is tremendously strong.
